Headline: මෛත්‍රිගේ කරේ වහපු කිරිල්ලී නිසා කරදර (බ්‍රහස්. කාටූන්)

comments.comment: Thalangam is going kade for UNP as usual.
do you want him to go "kade" for some one else.
Yes as a cartoonist he should go "kade" for the people in the country without showing his shameless partiality.
Dasa Suwaris usual anti MR kade
